Title: 39057 - Dealing With Debt After College
Direction: 500 Words. List 3-6 different tips for recent college graduates who are dealing with debt. Discuss things like saving money during the grace period before having to start paying back student loans, signing up for direct debit for any bills or money owed, budgeting, and using personal loans to help consolidate debt. You can place your client URL in the section were you talk about personal loans and how they can help with consolidating debt. Your target audience is college graduates, or soon-to-be college graduates who are dealing with debt.
